meanings.definition: A noble title given to a prince of the royal family in Austria.
meanings.sent1: The archdukes attended the royal ball in their finest attire.
meanings.sent2: The archdukes were respected members of the royal family.
meanings.sent3: The archdukes decided to have a friendly archery competition.
meanings.sent4: The archdukes ruled over their kingdom with grace and wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The archdukes' presence at the ceremony added a touch of elegance.

meanings.sent1: We learned about the archdukes in history class.
meanings.sent2: The portraits of the archdukes hung proudly in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The archdukes' hats were all mixed up at the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The archdukes' shadows stretched across the courtyard.
meanings.sent5: The archdukes' laughter echoed through the grand halls.
